prompt.description:
Use the rubric provided and evaluate yourself. Detail description of what every criteria means is provided in the rubrics that are on the front page of BoeingLearning. Note that your responses will have no effect on your grade. Submit your responses as a PDF to this assignment.

       Points   10

Submitting   a file upload

  File Types   pdf

criterion.name: Ideas
criterion.label: Ideas
criterion.prompt: Determine if there is a unifying theme or main idea.

option.name: Poor
option.label: Poor
option.explanation: Difficult for the reader to discern the main idea. Too brief or too repetitive to establish or maintain a focus.

option.name: Fair
option.label: Fair
option.explanation: Presents a unifying theme or main idea, but may include minor tangents. Stays somewhat focused on topic and task.

option.name: Good
option.label: Good
option.explanation: Presents a unifying theme or main idea without going off on tangents. Stays completely focused on topic and task.

criterion.name: Content
criterion.label: Content
criterion.prompt: Assess the content of the submission

option.name: Poor
option.label: Poor
option.explanation: Includes little information with few or no details or unrelated details. Unsuccessful in attempts to explore any facets of the topic.

option.name: Fair
option.label: Fair
option.explanation: Includes little information and few or no details. Explores only one or two facets of the topic.

option.name: Good
option.label: Good
option.explanation: Includes sufficient information and supporting details. (Details may not be fully developed; ideas may be listed.) Explores some facets of the topic.

option.name: Excellent
option.label: Excellent
option.explanation: Includes in-depth information and exceptional supporting details that are fully developed. Explores all facets of the topic.

rubric.feedbackprompt: (Optional) What aspects of this response stood out to you? What did it do well? How could it be improved?
